text: Jo manusya margadarsana prapta karato, to svatah apalya bhalyasathi margadarsana prapta karato ani jo margabhrasta ho'ila tara tyace ojhe tyacyavaraca ahe. Konihi ojhe balaganara dusarya kunace ojhe apalyavara laduna ghenara nahi ani amaca ha niyama nahi ki paigambara pathavinyapurvica azaba (siksa-yatana) pathavava
